original_text: Then David got up from the ground and he washed himself. He put special oil on his body and he dressed himself in clean clothes. Then he went into the Lord's house to worship him. After that, he went back to his palace. He asked his servants to bring some food and he ate it.
korean_text: 다윗이 땅에서 일어나 몸을 씻고 기름을 바르고 의복을 갈아입고 여호와의 전에 들어가서 경배하고 왕궁으로 돌아와 명령하여 음식을 그 앞에 차리게 하고 먹은지라

sentences.original_text: Then David got up from the ground
He put special oil on his body
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 몸에 특별한 기름을 발랐습니다

sentences.original_text: and he dressed himself in clean clothes
Then he went into the Lord's house
After that, he went back to his palace
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에, 그는 자기 궁으로 돌아갔습니다

sentences.original_text: He asked his servants to bring some food
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 종들에게 음식을 가져오라고 요청했습니다
